players.name: LeBron James
clues: Was drafted straight out of St. Vincent-St. Mary High School in Akron, Ohio
4-time NBA champion and 4-time Finals MVP with three different franchises
Became the NBA's all-time leading scorer in 2023, surpassing Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
Selected 1st overall in 2003 by his hometown Cleveland Cavaliers
Forward for the Los Angeles Lakers, entered the league at age 18
Wears #23, nicknamed 'King James'

players.name: Stephen Curry
clues: His father played 16 seasons in the NBA and his brother also plays professionally
4-time NBA champion and only unanimous MVP in league history (2016)
Holds the record for most 3-pointers made in NBA history with over 3,700
Selected 7th overall in 2009 out of Davidson College
Point guard for the Golden State Warriors, revolutionized modern basketball
Wears #30, nicknamed 'Chef Curry' for cooking from deep

players.name: Kevin Durant
clues: Grew up in Prince George's County, Maryland and played one year at Texas
2-time NBA Finals MVP, winning back-to-back titles with the Warriors
Has four scoring titles and a career scoring average over 27 points
Selected 2nd overall in 2007, one pick after Greg Oden
Forward for the Phoenix Suns, previously played for OKC, Warriors, and Nets
Wears #35, nicknamed 'KD' and 'The Slim Reaper'

players.name: Giannis Antetokounmpo
clues: Born in Athens, Greece to Nigerian immigrant parents, sold goods on the streets as a child
2021 NBA Finals MVP, dropping 50 points in the closeout Game 6
2-time MVP and has averaged a triple-double in a playoff series
Selected 15th overall in 2013, considered one of the biggest draft steals ever
Power forward for the Milwaukee Bucks, only MVP in franchise history since Kareem
Wears #34, nicknamed 'The Greek Freak'

players.name: Nikola Jokic
clues: Was drafted while the Nuggets staff was at a Taco Bell, famously picked 41st overall
3-time MVP (2021, 2022, 2024) and 2023 NBA Finals MVP
Only center in NBA history to average 25+ points, 10+ rebounds, and 9+ assists
Selected in the second round of the 2014 draft out of Serbia
Center for the Denver Nuggets, led them to their first championship in 2023
Wears #15, nicknamed 'The Joker'

players.name: Luka Doncic
clues: Won the EuroLeague MVP at age 19, the youngest ever, before entering the NBA
Led the Mavericks to the 2024 NBA Finals in just his sixth season
Youngest player in NBA history to record a 60-point triple-double
Selected 3rd overall in 2018 after being traded from Atlanta to Dallas
Point guard for the Dallas Mavericks, Slovenian superstar
Wears #77, Rookie of the Year in 2019

players.name: Joel Embiid
clues: Didn't start playing basketball until age 15 in his native Cameroon

Selected 3rd overall in 2014 out of Kansas
Center for the Philadelphia 76ers, nicknamed 'The Process'
Wears #21, known for his dominant post moves and social media presence
